name: depth-first-thinking
description: A terminal-based task manager with depth-first navigation. Break down tasks into subtasks, navigate recursively, and track progress.
author: alwalxed

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath && !process.env.npm_execpath.includes('bun')){console.error('\x1b[31mError: Use bun to install dependencies\x1b[0m\n\nInstall bun: https://bun.sh');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/dft && chmod +x dist/dft
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run check && bun run check-types && bun run build
scripts.ci: bun run format && bun run lint && bun run check-types
